title: Create numpy array from Input
description: Write a Python script that reads a line of space-separated numbers from input, creates a numpy array from them, and then prints the numpy array.

title: numpy array of Ones
description: Write a Python script that reads a number n from input and creates an numpy array of n ones using np.ones(), then prints it.

title: Add a Number to an numpy array
description: Write a Python script that reads a line of space-separated numbers to create an numpy array, reads a single number on the next line, and prints the numpy array after adding the single number to each element.

title: Count numpy array Elements
description: Write a Python script that reads space-separated numbers, creates an numpy array, and prints how many elements are in the numpy array.

title: Find Biggest Number
description: Write a Python script that reads space-separated numbers, creates an numpy array, and prints the biggest number.

title: Double All Numbers
description: Write a Python script that reads space-separated numbers, creates an numpy array, multiplies each number by 2, and prints the result.

title: Get First Element
description: Write a Python script that reads space-separated numbers, creates an numpy array, and prints the first element.

title: Add All Numbers
description: Write a Python script that reads space-separated numbers, creates an numpy array, and prints the sum of all numbers.

title: Make Number Sequence
description: Write a Python script that reads a number n and creates an numpy array with numbers from 1 to n using np.arange(1, n+1), then prints it.

title: Check numpy array Size from Input
description: Write a Python script that reads a line of space-separated numbers, creates a numpy array from them, and prints the numpy array's size (number of elements).
